name: part_012
file: tmp_【#兎田ぺこら３周年 ⧸ 3DLIVE】Chu! Summer Party♪【ホロライブ】 [Di8D8BvZZp0]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_012.mov

scenes.description: Usada Pekora performs the song 'Lavi' on stage with a space-themed background.
Transition with a black screen leading into the closing MC section.
Usada Pekora gives a closing message to her viewers over a celebratory illustration.

subtitles.original: 迷走だって あなたとしたい
subtitles.english: I want to stray with you.

subtitles.original: わたしを見ててほしいの よそ見はしないでね
subtitles.english: I want you to look at me, don't look away, okay?

subtitles.original: 不器用でも愛してね
subtitles.english: Love me even if I'm clumsy

subtitles.original: もっと跳べるから
subtitles.english: Because I can jump even more

subtitles.original: ラヴィ ラヴィ まだまだあなたと でっかいアイを更新中！
subtitles.english: Lavi, Lavi, still updating a huge love with you!

subtitles.original: 暴走しちゃったら制してね？
subtitles.english: If I go out of control, please stop me, okay?

subtitles.original: だって愛は非常識！
subtitles.english: Because love is irrational!

subtitles.original: ラヴィ もっともっと跳ねてたいから
subtitles.english: Lavi, I want to keep bouncing more and more

subtitles.original: ずっとそばで見ていてね！
subtitles.english: So please watch me from by my side forever!

subtitles.original: どんな想いでもくださいな
subtitles.english: Please give me any kind of feelings

subtitles.original: 月まで届くくらいに
subtitles.english: Enough to reach the moon

subtitles.original: 最大級のララララヴィ
subtitles.english: The greatest La-la-la-Lavi

subtitles.original: (ラビット！)
subtitles.english: (Rabbit!)

subtitles.original: もっとしたいの！ ララララヴィ
subtitles.english: I want to do it more! La-la-la-Lavi

subtitles.original: (ラビット！)
subtitles.english: (Rabbit!)

subtitles.original: みんなー！3周年ライブどうぺこだったー？
subtitles.english: Everyone! How was the 3rd anniversary live, peko?

subtitles.original: うー、わー！
subtitles.english: Ooh, wah!

subtitles.original: このあと10時15分から
subtitles.english: Starting from 10:15 PM after this

subtitles.original: メンバー限定のアフターライブもあるので、ぜひぜひ見に来てね！
subtitles.english: There will be a members-only after-live, so please come and watch!

subtitles.original: 4年目もぺこらストーリー歩もうぜ！
subtitles.english: Let's walk the Pekora story in the 4th year too!

subtitles.original: バイバーイ！
subtitles.english: Bye-bye!
